[h1][b]Mod Name: Smaller Geothermal Generator (更小的地熱發電機)[/b][/h1] [h2][i]Latest Version: 1.5.20250406[/i][/h2]
[i]If the mod isn’t auto-updated, please resubscribe to the mod and verify the integrity of the files.[/i]
[h3][url=https://github.com/emoryoakley/SmallerGeothermalGenerator/blob/master/README.zh.md]繁體中文說明[/url] | [url=https://github.com/emoryoakley/SmallerGeothermalGenerator/blob/master/README.md]English README[/url][/h3] [hr][/hr] [h3][b]Introduction:[/b][/h3] This is a simple RimWorld mod that adjusts the size of the original geothermal generator and introduces four new sizes: 2x2, 3x3, 4x4, and 5x5. To make it more realistic, the mod includes adjusted values for the four new geothermal generators, such as [b]max power output[/b], [b]resources to make[/b], [b]max hit points[/b], [b]work to make[/b], and [b]required construction skill levels[/b]. Aside from the listed values, theoretically, other building attributes or features remain consistent with the original geothermal generator.
You can also modify the [b]max power output[/b] and [b]resources to make[/b] in the mod settings. [h3][b]How to Use:[/b][/h3] [olist] [*] Subscribe to or download this mod from [url=https://github.com/emoryoakley/SmallerGeothermalGenerator/releases]release page[/url]. [*] Enable this mod in the game (no specific loading order required). [*] Research "Geothermal Power" in the game. Once completed, you can start constructing. [/olist] [h3][b]Generator Info:[/b][/h3] [olist] [*][b]Mini Geothermal Generator (2x2)[/b] [list] [*] Area: 4 Tiles [*] Power Output: 500 W [*] Power Efficiency: 125 W/Tile [*] Resources Required: 50 Steel, 2 Components [*] Maximum HP: 75 [*] Work Required: 1500 [*] Construction Skill Level: 2 [/list] [*][b]Light Geothermal Generator (3x3)[/b] [list] [*] Area: 9 Tiles [*] Power Output: 1000 W [*] Power Efficiency: 111.1 W/Tile [*] Resources Required: 120 Steel, 3 Components [*] Maximum HP: 175 [*] Work Required: 3500 [*] Construction Skill Level: 3 [/list] [*][b]Medium Geothermal Generator (4x4)[/b] [list] [*] Area: 16 Tiles [*] Power Output: 1800 W [*] Power Efficiency: 112.5 W/Tile [*] Resources Required: 200 Steel, 5 Components [*] Maximum HP: 300 [*] Work Required: 6000 [*] Construction Skill Level: 5 [/list] [*][b]High-Efficiency Geothermal Generator (5x5)[/b] [list] [*] Area: 25 Tiles [*] Power Output: 2700 W [*] Power Efficiency: 108 W/Tile [*] Resources Required: 300 Steel, 7 Components [*] Maximum HP: 450 [*] Work Required: 9000 [*] Construction Skill Level: 7 [/list] [*][b]Geothermal Generator (6x6) (Vanilla)[/b] [list] [*] Area: 36 Tiles [*] Power Output: 3600 W [*] Power Efficiency: 100 W/Tile [*] Resources Required: 340 Steel, 8 Components [*] Maximum HP: 500 [*] Work Required: 12000 [*] Construction Skill Level: 8 [/list] [/olist] [h3][b]Languages:[/b][/h3] This mod includes translations for: [list] [*] Traditional Chinese (繁體中文) [*] Simplified Chinese (简体中文) [*] English [/list] Feel free to create and share your own language translation mods to extend compatibility. [h3][b]Compatibility and Notes:[/b][/h3] [list] [*] This mod is incompatible with [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3373466885]Geothermal Power Extenders[/url]. [list] [*] You can still enable both this mod and the Geothermal Power Extenders mod in the game at the same time. [*] But the [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3373466885]Geothermal Power Extenders[/url] mod adds an extension building, which requires placement next to a geothermal generator. However, this extension building cannot be placed next to the four new geothermal generators added by this mod. [/list] [*] For additional details, please refer to the [url=https://github.com/emoryoakley/SmallerGeothermalGenerator]GitHub repository[/url]. [/list]
